General.Name: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business in Thailand. It offers medical services in the areas of heart, bone and joint, holistic oncology, hemodialysis, skin and laser, traditional Chinese medicine, ear, nose, throat, pediatrics, obstetrics, gynecology, medicine, dental, surgery, emergency, physical therapy, gastrointestinal, breast care, lasik, diabetes, endocrinology, brain, neurology, hepato-biliary, pancreas, X-ray, and eye, as well as operates kidney transplant and check-up centers. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: No. 345 Thepparat Road km 3.5, Bangkok, Thailand, 10260
